00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Linq;
00026 using System.Text;
00027 #endregion
00028 
00029 namespace Utilities.SQL.DataClasses
00030 {
00034     public class Database
00035     {
00036         #region Constructor
00037 
00042         public Database(string Name)
00043         {
00044             this.Name = Name;
00045             Tables = new List<Table>();
00046             StoredProcedures = new List<StoredProcedure>();
00047             Views = new List<View>();
00048             Functions = new List<Function>();
00049         }
00050 
00054         public Database()
00055         {
00056             Tables = new List<Table>();
00057             StoredProcedures = new List<StoredProcedure>();
00058             Views = new List<View>();
00059             Functions = new List<Function>();
00060         }
00061 
00062         #endregion
00063 
00064         #region Public Properties
00065 
00069         public string Name { get; set; }
00070         
00074         public List<Table> Tables { get; set; }
00075 
00079         public List<StoredProcedure> StoredProcedures { get; set; }
00080 
00084         public List<View> Views { get; set; }
00085 
00089         public List<Function> Functions { get; set; }
00090 
00096         public Table this[string Name]
00097         {
00098             get
00099             {
00100                 foreach (Table Table in Tables)
00101                 {
00102                     if (Table.Name == Name)
00103                     {
00104                         return Table;
00105                     }
00106                 }
00107                 return null;
00108             }
00109         }
00110 
00111         #endregion
00112 
00113         #region Public Functions
00114 
00119         public void AddTable(string TableName)
00120         {
00121             Tables.Add(new Table(TableName, this));
00122         }
00123 
00128         public void AddView(string ViewName)
00129         {
00130             Views.Add(new View(ViewName, this));
00131         }
00132 
00138         public void AddStoredProcedure(string ProcedureName, string Definition)
00139         {
00140             StoredProcedures.Add(new StoredProcedure(ProcedureName, Definition,this));
00141         }
00142 
00148         public void AddFunction(string Name, string Definition)
00149         {
00150             Functions.Add(new Function(Name, Definition, this));
00151         }
00152 
00153         #endregion
00154     }
00155 }
